hook.text: About 1,000 people grew up speaking Esperanto as their first language at home.

buildup.text: Esperanto couples who met at conventions sometimes raised their children bilingual in Esperanto.

discovery.text: These 'denaskuloj' (native-born speakers) prove Esperanto can function as a full natural language.
